name: Earth Child Topple
prerequisiteFormula: @wis_score >= 13 AND (@race:dwarf OR @race:gnome) AND @ability:defensive_training AND @feat:earth_child_style AND @feat:improved_trip AND @feat:improved_unarmed_strike AND @skill:acrobatics >= 6
descriptionText: Your mastery of balance and momentum allows you to bring down giants with your bare hands.
benefitText: You can trip a creature of the giant subtype of up to Huge size. While using Earth Child Style, you add your Wisdom bonus on combat maneuver checks made to trip a creature of the giant subtype, as well as on attack rolls to confirm a critical hit against such a creature.
normalText: You can trip only those opponents that are one size category larger than you.
